state.text: Tweak these sliders to alter the position of the VR user.
Here we do the VR camera calculations
The render loop. Click edit to go inside. This is where all the good stuff is located, so step right in! Click EDIT!

This scene works in VR with WebVR enabled browsers. Chromium and Mozilla have both released one.
To view in VR, download the builds and run with Oculus Rift in Extended more, and go fullscreen in Engi (button in the top menu bar).

For more information, check out my WebVR blog at http://webglvr.tumblr.com/

Thanks!
If HMD (Oculus Rift) is not available, the scene will be rendered normally.
